hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah reported:The Messenger of Allah(ﷺ) said: if anyone enters the mosque, and spits in it, or ejects phlegm, he should remove some earth and bury it there. If he does not do so, then he should spit in his clothes and not come out with it

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ الْبُزَاقِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ
chapter.eng-name: Spitting In A Masjid Is Disliked
